attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We at Alum Rock Youth Project belive that the goverment should do more to stop knife crime in our community as it is a huge problem.

Alum Rock Youth Project is a youth club catering for young people aged 11 - 25 years offering various activities. It occupies a unique venue in the Alum Rock area in the catolic church. We are a voluntary organisation.
